1832.SR.long_name: Al-Samaani Factory For Metal Industries Co.
1832.SR.summary: Al-Samaani Factory For Metal Industries Co. manufactures and supplies pallets, racking systems, and shelves for storage and handling solutions in Saudi Arabia. It offers products for storage solutions, such as pallet rack systems, shelving, cantilevers, archive shelving, and mezzanine; and super market solutions, including gondola shelving, shopping carts, fruits and vegetable display racks, bakery shelves, display hooks, spinner display racks, and super market gate systems. The company also provides material handling equipment, such as forklifts, cages and roll containers, and pallets; epoxy flooring systems; firefighting systems; cold storage solutions; lighting products; doors; and accessories comprising warehouse rack protectors, bar code/labels, and steel bollards. In addition, it offers engineering and consulting services, such as storage design, remove and installation, and project management services; logistic services; warehouse safety inspection services; and racking repair services. Further, the company provides automated systems, such as automated storage and retrieval systems, pallet conveyor system, and rack cladding buildings. It serves customers in governmental and semi-governmental sectors. The company also exports its products. Al-Samaani Factory For Metal Industries Co. is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
